query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.nome,
  p.totalClientes,
  p.status,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE pesquisaId = p.id) as clientes_linkados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE pesquisaId = p.id) as mercados_linkados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM produtos WHERE pesquisaId = p.id) as produtos_linkados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE pesquisaId = p.id) as concorrentes_linkados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE pesquisaId = p.id) as leads_linkados
FROM pesquisas p;
